description:
Rugged, sustainable, and oh-so-wearable, the Sol Defender Henley was made with the outdoors in mind. A casual long sleeve with UPF protection and great moisture-wicking properties, this men’s top is a great addition to any active wardrobe.

But hitting the trails isn’t the only thing the Sol Defender Henley is good for. Its clean lines and classic silhouette make it a winner no matter where you’re headed. And with 100% recycled polyester, it’s a look-good, feel-good shirt all round.
name: Prana Sol Defender Henley, Slim - Mens
